definition: (lit.) to fix one's gaze on/(fig.) to show interest in/(favorable) attention/favor
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province

sentences.english: This eclipse will work to your favor.
sentences.chinese: 這次月偏食將您的青睞。

sentences.english: It is greatly welcomed with a mass of enterprises and has built up a good company credit standing within and outside food industry.
sentences.chinese: 深受廣大企業的青睞，在業內外享有良好的企業信譽。

sentences.english: Analysts seem to like the new pricing model.
sentences.chinese: 分析師們似乎很青睞新的定價模式。

sentences.english: I company produces the hubei type finely machine also quite broad new old customer's favour.

sentences.chinese: 相反，它們對感染植株青睞有加。

sentences.english: It's for these reasons that the MP5 is the favorite among counter-terrorists and police forces worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 因此MP5受到世界範圍內的反恐和警力部隊的青睞。

sentences.english: It gets a really nice reception at a very good publisher.

sentences.english: His eloquent speech has won him the favor of the .

sentences.english: Microsatellites are now favoured by developing countries, with the notable exception of India.

sentences.english: We have a wealth of imagination and association, and we hope to get the employer's favor.
sentences.chinese: 我們有豐富的想象力和聯想力，希望得到僱主的青睞。

sentences.english: But some say the charts are slanted in favor of the stars who make the most small-screen appearances.
sentences.chinese: 而有人說排行榜十分青睞那些電視露面率很高的歌星。

sentences.english: "Jin Pin the spring" the brand, has won the general consumer's favor.

sentences.english: The Toyota Prius is the best-selling model.

sentences.english: It is typically favored by large industrial SCR operators.
sentences.chinese: 這是典型的青睞大型工業可控硅運營商。

sentences.english: Eyelid surgery was second most popular at 29 percent. A face shaped like a goose egg and double eyelids were favorite, it showed.

definition: to like/to love/to be fond of/favorite
domestic and international/at home and abroad
to love and respect/love and respect
first choice/premium/to come first in the imperial examinations
(of an area) vast or extensive/large-scale/widespread/(of people) numerous
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
